bgnTutContent.text: Welcome to the Word Game Beginner Level!
This game will teach you about the Morse code of certain words
This game consists of two buttons at the bottom of the page
Along with the picture and its definition at the top of the page
This button is used for the dots and can be accessed through the space button or by clicking here!
This button is used for the dashes and can be accessed through the space button or by clicking here!
Enter the Morse code of the underlined character and the rest of the word will autocomplete
There are a total 26 words, each starts with a different character
Complete all 26 words to beat the game, have fun!

medTutContent.text: Welcome to the Word Game Medium Intermediate Level!
This game will teach you about the Morse code of certain words
This game consists of two buttons at the bottom of the page
Along with the picture and its definition at the top of the page
This button is used for the dots and can be accessed through the space button or by clicking here!
This button is used for the dashes and can be accessed through the space button or by clicking here!
Enter the morse of the underlined character until you go through all the letters and move on to the next word
There are a total 26 words, each starts with a different character
Complete all 26 words to beat the game, have fun!

advTutContent.text: Welcome to the Word Game Medium Advanced Level!
This game will teach you about the Morse code of certain words without help
This game consists of two buttons at the bottom of the page
Along with the picture and its definition at the top of the page
This button is used for the dots and can be accessed through the space button or by clicking here!
This button is used for the dashes and can be accessed through the space button or by clicking here!
Enter the morse of the underlined character until you go through all the letters and move on to the next word
There are a total 26 words, each starts with a different character
Complete all 26 words to beat the game, have fun!
